Name: Members of the fire department who formerly served as police officers.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to members of the fire department who formerly served as police officers.
BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.Description: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

History.Description: A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
History.BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Civil Service and Labor
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by Roll Call.
This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Mayor
This Introduction was Signed Into Law by Mayor
This Introduction was Recved from Mayor by Council

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Paragraph 1 of subdivision a of section 15-111 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as amended by chapter 645 of the laws of 1998, is amended to read as follows:
(1) 	Any  member of the uniformed force of the fire  department,  who  immediately   prior  to  his  or  her appointment or employment as such, has served or  shall have served as  a  member  of  the  police  force  of  the  police   department,  shall  have  the  time served by such member in such police   department counted as service in the fire department in determining  his  or   her   [compensation,  promotion,] retirement  and  pension  in  such   department as herein or otherwise provided, upon condition  that  he  or   she  shall  contribute to the appropriate fire department pension fund a  sum equal to the amount which he or she  would  have  been  required  to   contribute  had  the time served in the police department been served in   the fire department. 
Â§2.  This local law shall take effect immediately and shall apply to persons who join the uniformed force of the fire department on or after the effective date.
